title: Suck UK Skull Scissors Gold Scissors Scissors All Purpose Gold Office Supplies And Accessories Goth Accessories & Fabric Scissors Skull Decor & Fun Office Supplies Sewing Accessories
description: Fancy a dead funny pair of gold scissors that are a cut above the rest? Suck UK has got you covered! Introducing the Skull Scissors. These spook-tacular scissors are the most memorable gold desk accessories. Say goodbye to boring scissors and bone-jour to these chilling all purpose scissors. Ideal for adding a touch of gothic decor to your kitchen supplies, sewing supplies and even fun office supplies. These gold scissors are the perfect gift for anyone who loves their embroidery kit and wants a vintage aesthetic to their craft supplies & materials. These scissors are an excellent addition to even your personal sewing products, making the ideal embroidery scissors sure to give any scissor thief the spooks! The nifty size means they are great as craft supplies for adults and embroidery supplies for small scale snipping. If you're in need of some new gold office decor, these scissors are ideal, with their brass finish, they are practical and heavy duty...the design is just an added bone-us. They aren't just for Halloween, these scissors are shear genius for all year round! Dimensions: 2.17 in x 4.76 in x 0.28 in
